text: adaralli spastavada drstantagalive. Ibrahimara sthanavide. Adarolage pravesisidavanu suraksitanadanu. Allahana meccugegagi i bhavanada hajj (yatre) maduvudu, (illige) prayanisaballa janara kartavyavagide.
